welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Grenchen, Switzerland! Known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history, we invite you to discover the charm of our city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and immerse yourself in the beauty of Grenchen."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Belp Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Euroairport France Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Euroairport France Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Euroairport Swiss Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Euroairport Swiss Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
